duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct comprehensive health assessment, differential medical diagnosis, and prescribing treatments for acute and chronic illness.
Develop and implement comprehensive plan of care, involving patients, families, and other healthcare team members.
Utilize specialized knowledge and skills in the provision of direct patient care, including prescription of drugs and devices.
Make independent decisions in solving complex patient care problems and collaborate with the healthcare team to achieve desired outcomes.
Utilize community assets and resources when making appropriate referrals and outreach for patients.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited Physician Assistant Training Program OR Masters of Science in Nursing (MSN), Nurse Practitioner (NP)
Licensed/certified and eligible to practice as Physician Assistant in the State of Arizona OR Advanced Practice Registered Nurse (APRN), Arizona
